JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: Job Opportunity: Kitchen Chef (2-3 Positions Available)
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Job Opportunity: Kitchen Chef (2-3 Positions Available)

We are currently seeking 2-3 experienced Kitchen Chefs to join our team at Sushi Room, a high-energy "All You Can Eat" sushi restaurant. If you have a passion for cooking, a strong work ethic, and the ability to work efficiently in a fast-paced environment, we’d love to hear from you!

Key Responsibilities:

  • Prepare sushi and other menu items with speed and precision.
  • Work efficiently in a team to ensure orders are completed quickly and to the highest standard.
  • Maintain a clean and organized kitchen space.
  • Follow safety and food handling procedures.

Requirements:

  • Proven experience in a kitchen or sushi-related role is essential. Formal education is not required, but we expect you to be skilled in food preparation and kitchen operations.
  • Strong knife skills and an understanding of basic kitchen tools.
  • Ability to stay focused and work quickly under pressure.
  • We’re a "no-frills" sushi restaurant, so we're looking for chefs who are practical and focused on delivering quality food at a fast pace — not those seeking to create food art.

What We Offer:

  • Competitive salary based on experience.
  • A dynamic and supportive work environment.
  • Opportunities for growth within the restaurant.

Important:
If you require a work visa, please be sure to inform us when applying.

If you’re ready to join a fast-paced, team-oriented kitchen, send us your resume or come by the restaurant to apply in person. We’re excited to meet you!

Sushi Room Aabenraa

Sourtheren Denmark
